code: import{apiAuth}from"../../utils/apiAuth";export var GET_STUDENT_DATA_START="GET_DATA_START";export var GET_STUDENT_DATA_SUCCESS="GET_DATA_SUCCESS";export var GET_STUDENT_DATA_FAIL="GET_DATA_FAIL";export var CREATE_NEW_STUDENT="CREATE_NEW_STUDENT";export var UPDATE_STUDENT="UPDATE_STUDENT";export var DELETE_STUDENT="DELETE_STUDENT";export var getStudentData=function getStudentData(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:GET_STUDENT_DATA_START});apiAuth().get("/student").then(function(res){console.log(res);dispatch({type:GET_STUDENT_DATA_SUCCESS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:GET_STUDENT_DATA_FAIL,payload:err});});};};export var createNewStudent=function createNewStudent(student){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:CREATE_NEW_STUDENT,payload:student});};};export var updateStudent=function updateStudent(student){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:UPDATE_STUDENT,payload:student});};};export var deleteStudent=function deleteStudent(student){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:DELETE_STUDENT,payload:student});};};
